1595390.name: Castle Dornstein
1595390.description:
Hemlock is a young scholar invited to a crumbling castle in the Bohemian countryside. The wealthy nobleman Lord Fiodor Dornstein has hired him to translate a mysterious medieval book known as The Devil's Diary, a text rumored to harbor an ancient evil.

But when the book goes missing on Hemlock's first night, everyone becomes a suspect. In order to find the book, Hemlock will need to explore the castle grounds, question the local villagers, and unravel the secrets of a dark past.
1595390.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
